text: Wife Number Two is a 1917 American silent drama movie. It was directed and written by William Nigh. The movie starred Valeska Suratt. It was the second to last silent movie that Suratt acted in. The movie is lost. That means no one can watch it or find any copies of it. Category:1917 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by William Nigh
title: Wife Number Two
